text: The Hilton family is an American family that originally comes from Norway. The family members are known for power, wealth and status as socialites in the United States. They are they family who made Hilton Hotel Group. The hotel was made by Conrad Hilton in 1919 when he got his first hotel. The Hilton family is one of the world's most powerful and famous families. The family is worth over $14.2 billion dollars. == References == == Related pages == * Kardashian family Category:Hilton family Category:American families
title: Hilton family
